name: BikerOrNot - New Black Layout
description:
For the New BON released 9-20-2011 - here is a theme for free!
They really make it tough with all the ads to slow the site down.
But not for my BON Friends...
additional_info:
v 1.0 - Complete rework (some changes are sure to come)
v 1.1 - minor visual changes & tweaks.
v 1.1a - removed the far right column that BON puts ads in...
v 1.1b - minor visual fixes (album images toolbar etc...)
v 1.1c - updated the RADIUS spec and added backwards compatibility with older Firefox browsers
v 1.1d - Chat window settings added
v.1.2  - a little cleanup for the new site ugliness they added 1-5-2015
v.1.2a - added a style for input buttons (comments and such)
v.1.2b - a few more tweaks. Removed the ADMIN ads in the thread views too.
v.1.2c - BON made a few changes to the site so I had to update again!
v.1.2d   Moved and reconfigured images to Cloudinary hosting
v.1.2e  Update to Remove the new Trending links section
